title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Madonna di Campiglio, Italy
content:
Photo submitted by Ronny Ansaldi, “I and my wife on the top of Madonna di Campiglio resort, altitude 2100 m. Exploring Dolomite Mountains riding our bikes has been great.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Madonna di Campiglio, Italy appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
